abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Pichu is anywhere under Pikachu, you may search your discard pile for a [L] Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Pikachu is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.
